website_summaries.verdict: The combination of 4 high-quality meat sources makes this grain-free food a protein powerhouse, and its overall balance of nutritious ingredients is well worth the high price.
pros: Duck, chicken, turkey, and cod are the first 4 ingredients
Includes probiotics for strong digestive health
Fortified with vitamins A, C, and E
cons: Has an off-putting odor that some finicky cats don't like

customer_reviews.title: Our rescue cat devours it
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a cat from our local humane society and wanted to spoil him. He had come in with ear mites, a puncture wound to his leg and a respiratory infection. Despite that he was friendly, and affectionate even with our 2 year old twins. I wanted to find a grain free food with the majority of its protein coming from meat. I came across Nulo and after researching the food and it's company decided to give it a try. He loves it. He devours everything in his bowl at mealtime and even seems to prefer it to treats. He has been flourishing since coming into our home and transitioning to Nulo. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Hides

customer_reviews.title: love the kibble size
customer_reviews.text: love the kibble size. My 8 year old Persian in liver failure went from months of diarrhea to nearly solid feces after just a few days. Also significantly improved smell. Sorry to talk poo but this food has made our household very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sooner

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not for my cats unfortunately.
customer_reviews.text: Cats liked it a lot. I liked that they liked it. I also was dead set on a grain free diet. The Vet and I had a discussion about grain free vs. grain and some small health issues my cats were experiencing. I switched to a grain included brand and their issues cleared up. So for us for now on we will stick with grain included. Not bashing grain free, but sometimes the ingredients used in lieu of grain causes issues for some cats like mine. They price was right. The kibble size was great and they gobbled it down when they were on it.
customer_reviews.author: G-Unit

customer_reviews.title: If you have a cat that has a sensitive stomach ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a cat that has a sensitive stomach this cat food is for you. We have a cat that use to throw up at least four times a week, but after changing to NULO, the throwing up has almost come to an end. We still see the occasional fur ball, but cats will be cats.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: My cat would never let me switch
customer_reviews.text: This food is my cat's favorite! When I first adopted her, they gave me a free bag of another brand. When I went to pick up initial supplies, the pet store also provided me with a free bag of Nulo Freestyle. Needless to say, Tulsa much preferred the Nulo food, and I haven't considered changing it since. I can't comment comparatively, but I can say that she has had consistently very good poops, has a nice soft coat, and is thrilled at mealtime. I'd highly recommend treating your cat to Nulo Freestyle!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good food, my cat approves
customer_reviews.text: My cat really likes Nulo; I noticed that the small kibble makes it a lot easier for her to chew, and when she's on the Nulo diet her poop doesn't smell awful as much. It goes in her automatic feeder and spits out really well, doesn't clog the machine. Previously she was spoiled with Tikka Cat wet food but thats very expensive and not sustainable. This helps her stay at a steady weight too.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A happy mom and cats!
customer_reviews.text: I have always struggled finding a quality food that both of my cats like. They are super picky and never seem to like the same food. This has become my two cats favorite food. Its small sized kibbled and perfect for them both. They are avpe to eat their food without throwing it up. It seems to be easy to digest because they don't have gas anymore. Super plus for me! Since switching to this brand their coats are soft, and shiny. They seem to be more playful and even more excited when its food time. I have recommended this food to all my cat parent friends!
customer_reviews.author: Sam.Ramon

customer_reviews.title: So far So good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after iams caused my cat to suffer from upper respiratory problems and then she did not like the food we bought from the store to try to get her better. So I ordered this after I read am article about the healthier good of 2019. It arrived today So the health benefits have yet to be evident. But she absolutely loves it! Some people said their cats wouldn't touch it. So i was nervous. I will update this when I see the health benefits. But she is happier after eating it so I know she feels better. 🐱
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Bane
customer_reviews.text: Hi my name is Bane, my owner purchased this food for meow because he wants the best for meow. He wants meow to grow big and strong like him. I like food especially the junky stuff, but I love this healthy food.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Clemmons

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it
customer_reviews.text: So after merrick before the grain got discontinued with no notice (yea, thanks for that). I did hours (seriously hours!) of research for a new cat food due to my one cat having respiratory disease and being highly sensitive to foods. He is doing well on week 2 of the food. The kibble is much smaller than Merrick. This company had no recalls and was a meat-based food without "unknown" ingredients. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My cats wont even touch this food!
customer_reviews.text: I heard this was a good brand and my cats are fat so I got the weight management. I've bought so many different foods trying to find a brand that my cats like and out of all of the food they've tried, this is the one they wont even touch. I've mixed them with other food and these kibbles are always left at the bottom of the bowl for days until I finally just throw them out. Also, they are the smallest kibbles I've ever seen! I will be donating to the animal shelter since my cats wont eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: About the same as prescription food
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our senior indoor outdoor cats, one of which has stomach problems. At first they hated the taste of it and avoided eating it but now they can't get enough of it. We switched from prescription food since it was so expensive. I have noticed a slight decrease in vomiting with my sick cat so that's good. Overall we love it and it's a little cheaper than prescription.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A

customer_reviews.title: Cat food
customer_reviews.text: I dont know what to say about this cat food product. I have two fairly young cats both of which will eat anything you give them. I was literally shock that either cat would not touch this kitty food all they did was sniff it and gave me a look of I’m not eating this stuff. I should have asked one of the pet stores to see if they had any samples of this product before wasting the money and eventually throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat disowned me!
customer_reviews.text: My cat hated this food so much she wouldn’t come near me and just hid. I tried mixing with her old food (which was making her chubby) but although eating it out of starvation she disowned me...period. Had to go back to blue wilderness. Rather a happy fat cat than thinner but hates my guts cat. Now she’s back to playing and loving me. Hope to find a salmon flavor low fat food she likes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: 2 paws down on the flavor. Nulo the company is still my choice though.
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to have to donate this recipe. My cat won’t touch this. She’ll begrudgingly have some, but leaves so much behind. I’ve only fed her Nulo (good sales girl), and I just reordered the other flavor (orange bag), but she’s just not into this option. I wanted it because it seemed better for her, but yea/ she’s not havin it, and we all know cats, especially our favorite cats, so what she says goes.
customer_reviews.author: LovePrime

customer_reviews.title: Still mixing with his regular food
customer_reviews.text: Well I have had this food for my kitty for awhile and I can’t get past the mixing it with his old food stage...who knows maybe I’ll continue to mix it. He’s still getting some benefits from it I guess. But he still eats it last. He picks out his grain filled food first then eats the Nulo as a last resort. I got up to half and half. But I can’t see upping the ratio to more grain free Nulo until he eats it normally. Just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Healthy food for my kitties
customer_reviews.text: We are careful about what we eat and I do the same for my animal friends. So many food lines contain corn and cats were definitely not made to eat corn. Especially the GMO corn that plagues the world. I love not having to trek to one of the pet superstores to get this every month!! Now Amazon conveniently brings it to me :) Amazon has freed us up to do the things that we really want to do. No more driving and waiting in line at a store!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Nulo Dry Versus Canned
customer_reviews.text: This is a good food. The only issue is that the last bag was wet when we unpacked it. Kitty liked the taste better than Core Wellness, but Nulo dry caused diarrhea, so we switched to Nulo CANNED food and his digestive system is 100% better. Sleeps better & has so much more energy! Bonus: kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Gee

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend for your cat or kitten.
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves this food and I have to be honest and tell you her poo poo does not smell that bad it's almost horrible to scoop away Plus she is healthy her fur is so soft and pretty and she's so very active I would highly recommend this food for every kitten or every cat as she grows.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: OK, but cat prefers others
customer_reviews.text: Switched to Nulo after using Taste of Wild. I switched hoping to help some urinary issues. My cat doesnt like the flavor, tried two different flavors for him. I also don't like the size as it requires little chewing which allows for plaque build up. Cat doesn't seem to like it as well. Takes him all day to finish and sometimes there is left overs the nex day. This has never been an issue before.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Ever since I switched him to this he's been doing great, no more throwing up
customer_reviews.text: My cat has an intestine problem, he gets inflammation, which causes him to throw up every kind of cat food I've tried. Ever since I switched him to this he's been doing great, no more throwing up, plus he loves the food!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Contains Chicken Fat.
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon promo for this food leaves out one ((1) thing. The food contains chicken fat (see nulo.com). In that one of my cats is allergic to all things chicken, this was a waste of over $20. Amazon really should list complete ingredients in ALL food items - whether it be for cats, dogs or humans. I don't happen to have $20 to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: South Florida

customer_reviews.title: Cats Won But Results Were Good.
customer_reviews.text: I like it but the cats don't. They refused to eat it for 3 days and won out. I had to resort to mixing it with canned food to get them to eat it. I thought that I had purchased it before but I thought it was chicken and cod for indoor cats. Their fur was shinier and the long haired one did not vomit as often, maybe once a week. Will have to try the blue package next time.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Bennington

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Food
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite brands to feed my four kitties. It's pricey but the quality is pretty worth it. The only problem I have is that my cats seem to throw up more because they swallow all the kibble since it's so small. I guess the size could either be a good or bad thing depending on your cat!
customer_reviews.author: CLK

customer_reviews.title: my 4 year old male maine coon eats it now.
customer_reviews.text: my 4 year old male maine coon eats it. didn.'t seem to like it the 1st couple days but likes it now. hasn't spit up neither. was using indoor sci diet and would spit up,' now use nulo indoor formula. need more time to give it 5 stars. only been a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Nutritious Morsels
customer_reviews.text: Got the right ingredients...good to see a company that tries. Size might apeeal to a kitten, but unfortunately not all.
customer_reviews.author: MDMarek1

customer_reviews.title: Beloved by all my cats
customer_reviews.text: Since switching to this cat food (from Purina), my 19-year-old kitty stopped what used to be occasional vomiting (it's been several months since I've found any cat vomit around the house). The young cats love it, too - the kittens switched to it around 6 months and it seems to keep everyone happy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: My cat is obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about the process of switching him to Nulo because I'd read some reviews saying it can take some adjustment and time, since so much other cat food on the market is basically junk food and this is actually good for them. No problem whatsoever! I have my cat on this dry food for breakfast and their wet food for dinner. He likes some of the wet food flavors much better than others but is totally obsessed with the dry food, our biggest problem now is him begging for it! I feel great giving him something he loves that is also good for him.
customer_reviews.author: claire williams

customer_reviews.title: feral rescue cat eats it
customer_reviews.text: i have a semi-feral cat i picked up from a no kill shelter about a year ago who is a notoriously picky eater. she wont eat wet food of any kind, and she sticks her nose up at most any treat i try to give her. but she likes nulo. she eats it reliably, and her long fur no longer gets those vicious tangles from being matted down. its always soft and luscious. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Hasson

customer_reviews.title: A dry food my cat actually enjoys
customer_reviews.text: Previously my cat would just eat the dog food, and wait for a daily dose of wetfoot and barely touch her dry food, however when I switched to this she noticably enjoyed it and would regularly. This definitely made a difference and has been a great addition to the food line up.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: The Cats Have Spoken--Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Having researched the ingredients in a lot of cat foods I found this to be one of the highest in nutritional value for the price. But thankfully all my cats LOVE it also. The high protein content & no fillers make it my top choice & theirs!
customer_reviews.author: A. Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small round pieces- not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Reason for 2 stars is they were Super tiny pellets and hardly any crunch so my guys wouldn’t touch it. Which is shocking as they eat everything! They eat And love Nulo wet but I wasn’t expecting the small pieces... Would not have purchased had I known!
customer_reviews.author: A. goodman

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: My old cat has failing teeth and the small kibbles are perfect for her. I have also noticed that she seems to be digesting it better than any other cat food because she doesn’t throw up as often with this food. I have three adult cats and they all switched to this food without incident.
customer_reviews.author: TawnyJ

customer_reviews.title: My cats don't like it
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be a good product, but I have 6 cats that do not especially like it. It has an off-putting odor. Cats are very descriminating creatures and it's hard to say what motivates the little darlings.
customer_reviews.author: TheClyde

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: My cat is not a fussy eater, so I was able to switch her right away from Wellness Core to Nulo. Wellness is a good brand, but I read several reviews with higher ratings for Nulo. Both Wellness and Nulo are grain free, but Nulo has a higher percentage of protein, and that's what decided me to change.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Stone

customer_reviews.title: Cats loved it but pieces too small so vomited all over
customer_reviews.text: Pieces are too small for them to chew so indigestible and dry swallowed
customer_reviews.author: Victory

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, and with probiotics
customer_reviews.text: My cat really likes this. Pretty consistently even, which is saying a lot for a cat. The pieces are very small, which is good for a cat with mouth/teeth/chewing problems. Probiotics for digestion issues. We are on our third bag. That's amazing for food fickle kitties.
customer_reviews.author: S. O. Rooney MA GGCP

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Says It's Second Choice...
customer_reviews.text: ...but she eats it anyway -- just not as fast as she eats some other brand. POINT IS SHE EATS IT, SHE DOES NOT PRANCE AWAY IN DISDAIN!
customer_reviews.author: unsworthyeti

customer_reviews.title: Chonky Boi Approved ✔
customer_reviews.text: Look, I didn't taste the food and I think it smells awful but my cats dug it, and my chonky boi had lost some weight! Unfortunately they're on a prescription diet now. But I do recommend this do other chonks.
customer_reviews.author: rowlet

customer_reviews.title: To fishy for my feline.
customer_reviews.text: My cat would not touch this at all. We even had to clean the feeding container.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff jones

customer_reviews.title: keeps her from getting super gassy, and makes her coat soft and shiny
customer_reviews.text: The Nulo brand cat food has served my kitty well. I've switched her between Nulo types of food twice, and she has had no stomach trouble with the changes. This food is appealing, keeps her from getting super gassy, and makes her coat soft and shiny. I'm a huge fan of Nulo.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My cat would not eat this. Gave it to my daughter's cats. They won't eat it either.
customer_reviews.author: library lady

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My cats seem to throw up way less with food than others like Taste of the Wild. Maybe it’s the smaller granules of food? I don’t know. But they’re eating more and seem to be at a healthier weight with this food.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: My cat who is a Maine Cooncat and finicky I am slowly trying to mix it with food he likes but is crap. But so far he turns up his nose and refuses to eat it
customer_reviews.author: Chip Hafemeister

customer_reviews.title: Better Food, Healthier Cat
customer_reviews.text: I was worried with my diva cat Stella since she is picky. She loves this brand. She eats the Duck and Lentil brand. I have noticed more energy from her as well as just looking happier. She is more active and so excited when her bowl gets re-filled. Must buy. Previously a Purina Naturals Indoor user.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Cats not a fan?
customer_reviews.text: My cats didn't really want to eat it. They do eat it because they are hungry. I got this because 1 of my 3 cats has diabetes so I wanted less sugar and more protein in the food. I'm now going to try the weight management formula. It has more protein than this one and is a different flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Morse

customer_reviews.title: they all loved it. So I took a chance and ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently was given a sample of this product and when I gave a taste to them, they all loved it. So I took a chance and ordered a larger bag and to my surprise, they loved it still. The ingredients are what I was looking for and will continue to feed all 8 of my cats this wonderful and healthy product. Thank you for selling this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: my senior cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: I usually get the regular indoor adult, but wanted to get something specific to senior cats for my 11 year old. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Olexia S.

customer_reviews.title: CATS WOULDN'T EAT IT
customer_reviews.text: I don't have picky eaters. Oddly none of them would eat this. So I'm wondering if it's the Amazon product as I've seen a few other posts indicating that their cat ate the product from the store but not from Amazon. Will go buy some from the store and test the theory. It's just very odd that none of my three would eat it.
customer_reviews.author: namb

customer_reviews.title: I like that it seems far healthier than other cat foods ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat is very finicky and she loves this food. I like that it seems far healthier than other cat foods I see with anything "by-product meal" in their ingredients list.
customer_reviews.author: MegL

customer_reviews.title: MY BOYS LIKE IT!
customer_reviews.text: My cats like this product. I am satisfied with the ingredients and I believe it's helped the throw up issue I had with one of my cats because the pellets are smaller than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Hope

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: The only kibble cat food my cat does NOT throw up. Thankful to have found. I did find that due to the lentils I needed to supplement with L Taurine....
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like it but the cat does
customer_reviews.text: Our cat really loves this food. Our dog seems to always want something new and is very picky. The cat will eat this exclusively without an issue. I didn’t find it much to my own personal taste however.
customer_reviews.author: ChuckS

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but they love it
customer_reviews.text: I wish my cats didn’t love this so much! The price is so high but they love it so it’s what they get. Started with the small bag to make sure they enjoy it and they couldn’t get enough.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Kessler

customer_reviews.title: My cat kept getting sick
customer_reviews.text: My cat's not one to throw up often...ever. But after eating this, he's thrown up at least 3 times in two weeks. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: FluffytheNewt

customer_reviews.title: My cat didn't like this
customer_reviews.text: The flavor needs to be improved upon because my cats would rather rob my dogs bowl than eat this food unfortunately. :-/
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Lazy girl gets energy
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this food, it gives my cat (a 9 year old cat who sleeps 20 hours a day) actual energy so that she'll get up and run and play! Also, she of course loves it and gets ecstatic for it. I am now, however, going to switch to their line of senior food due to her age but I highly, highly recommend this food to any fellow cat lovers
customer_reviews.author: Kaia K

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food
customer_reviews.text: All three of our cats love this food! Great grain free better quality cat food than something you would find at a regular grocery store. Subscribe & save!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Wright

customer_reviews.title: Not for my cats
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping my cats would like this food however they did not my male cat is not picky he eats about anything except for this food.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this food
customer_reviews.text: My small cat who isn't much of a big eater just loves this food and she is so much healthier looking now that we have been feeding her this.
customer_reviews.author: propwash03

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it...not great for indoor cats though
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this food! They are however indoor cats and don’t get as much exercise, and once I switched them to this food they gained so much weight!! I have switched them over to the weight management version of this brand. They don’t like it as much but they still eat it lol
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Cat (savannah) didn't care for the taste
customer_reviews.text: I can't really say anything bad about the nutritional value just that my cat didn't like the taste of this compared to some other grain free cat foods (Taste of the Wile, Arcana, Orijen)
customer_reviews.author: montaillou

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food for sensitive stomachs
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is super picky and has a very sensitive tummy. She loves the food and she has not digestion issues.
customer_reviews.author: BeachMom

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: First time I ordered bag came ripped, but when I ordered again my car loved this!
customer_reviews.author: Rayath

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food!
customer_reviews.text: My pet store stopped carrying Nulo, thankfully it's on Amazon. My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: My cat doesn’t like it at all
customer_reviews.text: Cat hates this food. Tried to get her on it gradually but to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: surfwriter

customer_reviews.title: My picky eater loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried switching to other brands and he would rather starve than eat anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for hair loss
customer_reviews.text: My cat has been loosing clumps of hair. I switched to this cat food and my cats hair loss stopped.
customer_reviews.author: ld

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food!
customer_reviews.text: Glad to find a non-chicken cat food. Cat not shedding and health has improved in short time.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a very picky eater. Hates wet food and fish flavors. He also cannot keep down grains. He loves this food and has ben doing great on it for months.
customer_reviews.author: LaLaMaMa

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that my cat Mazey loves the stuff! She took to it right away and she is not easy to please.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great food for cats
customer_reviews.text: very good for a cats diet. my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: A kibble food that cats might enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item. My cat loves this kibble food. The order was swiftly sent and packaged well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for cats
customer_reviews.text: Duck and lentils. Cats loved it. Little pellets were easily consumed. Hope the ducks were humanely raised and killed.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnne H.

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like this product
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this after reading about the Nulu brand and I fell in love with their goal in providing such high quality pet food. However my cat will not even attempt to eat this. He smelled it and just pushed the bowl away with his paw. Hopefully your cat will like it but mine wanted nothing to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Very healthy for my kitten. Keeps her energy up and at a proper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C

customer_reviews.title: Seems like decent food
customer_reviews.text: Seems like decent food, but the kibble so tiny that my fully grown cat hardly chews it and throws it right back up... not for me
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ann

customer_reviews.title: My cats would not eat it.
customer_reviews.text: I have four cats. And some how, some way they left this food in the bowls when I attempted small amounts mixed in with their existing food to integrate it. It has been about 4 weeks and still they don't eat it. I am sure it is wonderful and healthy but if they don't eat it, what is the point. Sadly, I won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: D in new york

customer_reviews.title: Good nutritional breakdown; not liked by my unpicky cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat doesn’t love the taste. I may try a different protein after this bag is done
customer_reviews.author: ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great food at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is the food we’ve been using for our cat for years and this is the best price we can find it for.
customer_reviews.author: Dustyn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Our Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My Cat is a finicky eater and this is one of the only foods he enjoys. It’s hard to find a grain free food that’s got decent ingredients for a decent price... this is just that.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Moser

customer_reviews.title: The cats didn't care for it at all!
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would love it, but they wouldn't touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Findley

customer_reviews.title: Cats and dogs
customer_reviews.text: All my animals love this food, especially the elder one I bought it for. She doesn't need to loss weight but the probiotics and flavor in this food is doing her well.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for cat that throws up a lot, ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for cat that throws up a lot, but getting her to eat it is a problem. She prefers her old food.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kaapke

customer_reviews.title: Cats hated it
customer_reviews.text: Our cats literally wont even touch this food. I hope we can return it because we have almost an entire bag that we will not be able to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but..
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a cat and turned her nose up at this. I have since discovered she isn't a poultry or dry food type of cat. 4 stars for a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but my cat loves it, so its worth it! very small pieces, easy to eat.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a dry food that was really small so my kitty with teeth/tongue problems could easily eat. These are way smaller than I thought and im totally stoked! These she practically swallows so she has no issue at all with eating. reading the ingredients and stuff on the back makes me feel good too since it seems like more of a healthier route then the junk food dry food at the grocery store. She eats it no problems, and she can be picky!
customer_reviews.author: MarieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: This seems like crack to my cats. When the bowl is empty they will claw open the pantry and chew holes in the bag to get more! The price fluctuations are not convenient from eight bux a bag to 32 bux seems exorbitant
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Ashley

customer_reviews.title: My cats really enjoy this food
customer_reviews.text: My cats really enjoy this food. I also like how the morsels are very small and easy for them to chew. Quality ingredients.

customer_reviews.title: Clean and healthy for our picky cat
customer_reviews.text: Kitty (typical picky eater who is used to fancy food) loves this food. I researched brands and their track records before purchasing. Seems like Nulo is the real deal! It’s a great product !

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: We had to go through quite a few cat foods before landing on this one. My cat had digestive issues and Nulo did the trick! We're happy we found this option.

customer_reviews.text: Great food. Cat loves it. Price is awesome for such good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this flavor
customer_reviews.text: Our cats (4) love this flavor, we are repeat customers.

customer_reviews.text: Stronger odor than regular cat food but cats cannot absorb carbs and this is low on carbs - much better for them

product_meta.title: Nulo Grain Free Dry Cat Food - Indoor, Adult Trim, or Hairball Management with BC30 Probiotic, Salmon, Duck or Turkey Recipe - 5 or 12 lb Bag
product_meta.description:
Size:5 lb| Style:Indoor Cat

 For your tiny tiger 

 The fact that humans have domesticated the cat to live under roof with us does not modify their inherent carnivorous nature. Nulo Grain Free Dry Cat Food contains more of the ingredients that your cat would be eating in the wild. It is comprised of 83% animal protein, resembling your cat's natural diet more closely than grain-based carbohydrates. Nutritionally balanced and delicious, Nulo Dry Cat Food helps to maintain your cat's optimal weight so she can keep up with that elusive laser pointer and stalk her catnip mouse toys to her heart's content. 

 Only the best will do 

 Nulo assembled the brightest minds in the pet food industry and, using the finest natural ingredients, created unique recipes to tickle your cat's taste buds and support overall good health. Our dry cat food contains no corn; wheat; soy; artificial colors, flavorings or preservatives. We also add the patented BC30 Probiotic to our formula to support healthy gut flora and make digestion easier. The result is a protein-rich recipe that keeps your cat looking and feeling great from head to tail. 

 For every stage of your cat's life 

 The amount of food that your cat needs will depend upon activity level, age, environment and breed. Nulo Grain Free Dry Cat Food should be allocated at 1 cup for adult cats over 15 lbs., plus a quarter cup for each additional 4 lbs. Adjust food as necessary to maintain optimal body weight. Nursing or pregnant cats may require up to 3 times the amount indicated on package directions. Always provide access to clean, fresh water. 

 Ensure your cat's complete health now and in the future. Add Nulo Grain Free Dry Cat Food with BC30 Probiotic to your cart today.
feature_bullets: PATENTED BC30 PROBIOTIC supports healthy gut flora. Also known as Bacillus Coagulans, this lactic-acid producing bacteria aids in food digestion, metabolism regulation and normal immune response.
SUPPORTS WEIGHT MANAGEMENT through reduced carbohydrate intake. Your cat retains her youthful vitality while being less susceptible to kidney disease, respiratory infections and osteoarthritis.

SMALL MORSELS shaped like disks with taste and texture that appeal to cats’ finicky palates. The act of chewing these morsels helps polish your cat’s teeth to prevent the build-up of plaque and tartar.
GRAIN-FREE recipe contains no corn; wheat; soy; white potatoes; tapioca; artificial colors, flavorings or preservatives. Based in Austin, TX and proudly made in the USA.

HIGH MEAT/LOW CARB proprietary formula 83% animal-based protein for more amino acids and better flavor. Nulo FreeStyle also uses fewer carbs and low glycemic ingredients like lentils, sweet potato and chickpeas.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
